# [Interview #929: AMOL Signing Report - DJ Stipe, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=929#12)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Since many asked this, Stormlight 2 will be out in Christmas 2013 if lucky, otherwise Spring 2014.
